review: I rate this at only 3 out of 5 because, although the product in and of itself is satisfactory, it does not adapt to those subscribers that suffer from a low speed DSL location. My physical address sits near the end of the DSL line, therefore we are stuck with low quality and sometimes interrupted streaming at times. After many years of complaints lodged with our ISP, there is nothing more we can do. We do not live in town, so cable is not an option, and satellite is not the best deal for us either.With my laptop, it adapted by adjusting the quality of the feed, which I can live with.The Stick is not capable of such a function, (hence the on-screen warnings of low speed connection) and should be. It's fortunate I only spent $20 instead of full price.

review: I get green screen issue every 5 mins. Turn the TV off and on helps for 5 mins.How can I fix this?FIX FOUND:This happens to Panasonic Plasma TVs. Turn off Pixel Orbiter under Anti Image Retention Setting.This will fix it immediately. Everything works fine.Leaving it at 1 star until Amazon fixes this bug.Thank you Danny C. for telling us the fix.REVISED REVIEW TO 5 STARS. - 02.15.2015
